description.value:
Requirements Your last action was a Strike made with a weapon or unarmed attack empowered by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Herald's Weapon].

You call upon your deity's power and channel it through your weapon. The creature you hit in your previous action must attempt a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell] saving throw against the higher of your class DC or your spell DC.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))[spirit]]{spirit damage equal to half your level}.

Failure The target takes @Damage[(@actor.level)[spirit]]{spirit damage equal to your level} and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Critical Failure The target takes @Damage[(2*@actor.level)[spirit]]{spirit damage equal to twice your level}, is knocked prone, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the beginning of your next turn.
